random.text: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see
random.author: -Henry David Thoreau

random.text: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
random.author: -J. K. Rowling

random.text: Be not afraid of discomfort. If you can't put yourself in a situation where you are uncomfortable, then you will never grow. You will never change. You'll never learn.
random.author: -Jason Reynolds

random.text: Confidence comes from discipline and training.
random.author: -Robert Kiyosaki

random.text: Where words fail, music speaks.
random.author: -Hans Christian Andersen

random.text: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
random.author: -Gertrude Stein

random.text: Knowledge is like money: to be of value it must circulate, and in circulating it can increase in quantity and, hopefully, in value.
random.author: -Louis L'Amour

random.text: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
random.author: -Frederick Douglass

random.text: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
random.author: -Corrie Ten Boom

random.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
random.author: -Thomas Edison

random.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
random.author: -Yogi Berra

random.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
random.author: -Abraham Lincoln

random.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
random.author: -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

random.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
random.author: -Byron Pulsifer

random.text: Be the chief but never the lord.
random.author: -Lao Tzu

random.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
random.author: -Carl Sandburg

random.text: Well begun is half done.
random.author: -Aristotle

random.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
random.author: -Yogi Berra

random.text: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
random.author: -Margaret Sangster

random.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
random.author: -Buddha

random.text: What you give is what you get.
random.author: -Byron Pulsifer

random.text: We can only learn to love by loving.
random.author: -Iris Murdoch

random.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
random.author: -Karen Clark

random.text: You'll see it when you believe it.
random.author: -Wayne Dyer

random.text: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
random.author: -Robert Kiyosaki

random.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
random.author: -Martin Fowler

insp.author: type.fit

insp.text: Kindness is the only service that will stand the storm of life and not wash out.
insp.author: Abraham Lincoln

insp.text: The advancement and diffusion of knowledge is the only guardian of true liberty.
insp.author: James Madison

joke.text: My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you’re a banana.
joke.author: -Rose (Betty White), The Golden Girls

joke.text: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
joke.author: -Will Ferrell

joke.text: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
joke.author: -Oscar Wilde

joke.text: In real life, I assure you, there is no such thing as algebra
joke.author: -Fran Lebowitz

joke.text: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer.
joke.author: -Ellen DeGeneres

joke.text: Whoever said that money can’t buy happiness, simply didn’t know where to go shopping.
joke.author: -Bo Derek

joke.text: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.
joke.author: -Charles M. Schulz

joke.text: I remember it like it was yesterday. Of course, I don’t really remember yesterday all that well.
joke.author: -Dory, “Finding Dory”

joke.text: Love is blind but marriage is a real eye-opener.
joke.author: Pauline Thomason

joke.text: Everybody wants to save the Earth; nobody wants to help Mom do the dishes.
joke.author: P.J. O’Rourke, All the Trouble in the World

joke.text: I never feel more alone than when I’m trying to put sunscreen on my back.
joke.author: Jimmy Kimmel
